title: ion-toggle
body: Toggles change the state of a single option. Toggles can be switched on or off by pressing or swiping them. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the
The background of the toggle track and handle can be customized using CSS variables. There are also variables for setting the background differently when the toggle is checked.
property, which is a shorthand, it can accept any value that the
A more complex case may involve adding an image to the handle background.
Taking it a step further, we could use the
pseudo-elements to position text on top of the background.

Due to the handle having a fixed height, to remove the spacing on the top and bottom, set the height to 100%.

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true, the user cannot interact with the toggle.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: name
props.docs: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

props.name: value
props.docs:
The value of the toggle does not mean if it's checked or not, use the checked property for that.

The value of a toggle is analogous to the value of a <input type="checkbox">, it's only used when the toggle participates in a native <form>.

docs: Toggles change the state of a single option. Toggles can be switched on or off by pressing or swiping them. They can also be checked programmatically by setting the `checked` property.

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp

docsTags.text: track - The background track of the toggle.
docsTags.name: part

docsTags.text: handle - The toggle handle, or knob, used to change the checked state.
docsTags.name: part

events.docs: Emitted when the toggle loses focus.
Emitted when the value property has changed.
Emitted when the toggle has focus.

styles.name: --background-checked
styles.docs: Background of the toggle when checked

styles.name: --border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the toggle track

styles.name: --handle-background-checked
styles.docs: Background of the toggle handle when checked

styles.name: --handle-border-radius
styles.docs: Border radius of the toggle handle

styles.name: --handle-box-shadow
styles.docs: Box shadow of the toggle handle

styles.name: --handle-max-height
styles.docs: Maximum height of the toggle handle

styles.name: --handle-spacing
styles.docs: Horizontal spacing around the toggle handle
